price: 64. Diggah woo girâ mari sittat aba giddii kee keemaari nummay agay- waaga sinni.
arabic: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقّٞ تَخَاصُمُ أَهۡلِ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna dhālika laḥaqqun takhāṣumu ahli al-nāri
